welcome.title: Welcome to JAI1!
welcome.message: Hello {{firstName}}, thank you for registering. Complete your profile and upload your documents to begin your tax return.

document_reviewed.title: Document Reviewed
document_reviewed.message: Your {{documentType}} "{{fileName}}" has been reviewed by our team.

docs_missing.title: Documents pending
docs_missing.message: Please upload the missing documents to continue with your tax return: {{missingDocs}}

ticket_response.title: Response to your ticket
ticket_response.message: You have received a response to your ticket: {{subject}}

referral_new.title: New referral
referral_new.message: {{referredName}} signed up using your referral code.

referral_successful.title: Successful referral
referral_successful.message: Congratulations! {{referredName}} completed their process. You will receive your ${{amount}} discount when you get your refund.

discount_applied.title: Discount applied
discount_applied.message: A discount of ${{amount}} has been applied to your account for your successful referral.

problem_resolved.title: Issue resolved
problem_resolved.message: The issue with your process has been resolved.

alarm_verification_timeout.title: Action required: Verification pending
alarm_verification_timeout.message: Your {{track}} return has been in verification for {{days}} days. Please contact support if you haven't received instructions from the IRS.

alarm_letter_sent.title: Reminder: Letter sent
alarm_letter_sent.message: A letter related to your {{track}} return was sent {{days}} days ago. Check if you have received it and respond if necessary.

alarm_general.title: Update on your process
alarm_general.message: There is an important update about your {{track}} return. Check your process status or contact support for more information.

status_federal_filed.title: Federal return submitted
status_federal_filed.message: Your federal return has been submitted to the IRS.

status_federal_processing.title: Federal return in process
status_federal_processing.message: The IRS is processing your federal return.

status_federal_approved.title: Federal refund approved
status_federal_approved.message: Your federal refund has been approved! Estimated deposit date: {{estimatedDate}}

status_federal_deposited.title: Federal refund deposited!
status_federal_deposited.message: Your federal refund of ${{amount}} has been deposited to your account.

status_state_filed.title: State return submitted
status_state_filed.message: Your state return has been submitted.

status_state_processing.title: State return in process
status_state_processing.message: Your state is processing your return.

status_state_approved.title: State refund approved
status_state_approved.message: Your state refund has been approved! Estimated deposit date: {{estimatedDate}}

status_state_deposited.title: State refund deposited!
status_state_deposited.message: Your state refund of ${{amount}} has been deposited to your account.
